edu.mccc.cos210.fp2014.cm.game

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mccc.cos210.fp2014.cm.game.Board
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    This class represents the piece centric board of the chess engine. It contains meta information about itself, the position of pieces, and turn info. It also keeps track of information about draw scenarios.
